name: Unusual File Download from Direct IP Address
description: Detects the download of suspicious file type from URLs with IP
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(Contents:(*\:\/\/1* OR *\:\/\/2* OR *\:\/\/3* OR *\:\/\/4* OR *\:\/\/5* OR *\:\/\/6* OR *\:\/\/7* OR *\:\/\/8* OR *\:\/\/9*) AND file.path:(*.ps1\:Zone* OR *.bat\:Zone* OR *.exe\:Zone* OR *.vbe\:Zone* OR *.vbs\:Zone* OR *.dll\:Zone*))`
